column.name: soundingid
column.comment: record id field which is the autoincremented record counter in the header table

column.name: idflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate if id is WMO,WBAN or other

column.name: mandqm
column.comment: string containing the quality marks for the mandatory data

column.name: sigsqm
column.comment: string containing the quality marks for the signifcant levels data

column.name: nwzqm
column.comment: number of wind by height levels

column.name: wzqm
column.comment: string containing the quality marks for the wind by height data

column.name: nwpqm
column.comment: number of wind by pressure levels

column.name: wpqm
column.comment: string containing the quality marks for the wind by pressure data

column.name: tropqm
column.comment: string containing the quality marks for the tropospheric data
